original: Majjhima Nikāya 2
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Sabbāsavasutta
analyzed: sabbāsavasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “sabbāsavasaṁvarapariyāyaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi.
analyzed: sabba āsava savara pariyāyam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Jānato ahaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
analyzed: jānataḥ aha bhikkhave passataḥ āsavānam khayam vadāmi no a jānataḥ no a passataḥ

original: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiñca passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi?
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave jānataḥ kiñca passataḥ āsavānam khayam vadāmi

original: Yoniso ca manasikāraṁ ayoniso ca manasikāraṁ.
analyzed: yonisaḥ ca manasikāram a yonisaḥ ca manasikāra

original: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhanti;
analyzed: ayonisaḥ bhikkhave manasikarotaḥ anuppannā ca iva āsavāḥ uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhanti

original: yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pahīyanti.
analyzed: yonisaḥ ca kho bhikkhave manasikarotaḥ anuppannā ca iva āsavā na uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pahīyanti

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave āsavā dassanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā savarā pahātabbā atthi āsavā

original: paṭisevanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā,
analyzed: paṭisevanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā

original: atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā

original: 1. Dassanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: dassana apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavāḥ dassanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto—
analyzed: idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: manasikaraṇīye dhamme nappajānāti, amanasikaraṇīye dhamme nappajānāti.
analyzed: manasikaraṇīye dhamme na ppajānāti a manasikaraṇīye dhamme na ppajānāti

original: So manasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānanto amanasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānanto, ye dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā, te dhamme manasi karoti, ye dhammā manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme na manasi karoti.
analyzed: so manasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānantaḥ a manasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānantaḥ ye dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme manasi karoti ye dhammā manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme na manasi karoti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ na manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme manasi karoti

original: Yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhati;
analyzed: yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikarotaḥ anuppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: anuppanno vā bhavāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā bhavāsavo pavaḍḍhati;
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: anuppanno vā avijjāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā avijjāsavo pavaḍḍhati—
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: ime dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti.
analyzed: ime dhammā na manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme manasi karoti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme na manasi karoti?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme na manasi karoti

original: Yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pahīyati;
analyzed: yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikarotaḥ anuppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: anuppanno vā bhavāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā bhavāsavo pahīyati;
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: anuppanno vā avijjāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā avijjāsavo pahīyati—
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: ime dhammā manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme na manasi karoti.
analyzed: ime dhammā manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme na manasi karoti

original: Tassa amanasikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ manasikārā manasikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ amanasikārā anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhanti.
analyzed: tassa a manasikaraṇīyānam dhammānam manasikārāḥ manasikaraṇīyānam dhammānam a manasikārāḥ anuppannā ca iva āsavā uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhanti

original: So evaṁ ayoniso manasi karoti:
analyzed: saḥ evam ayonisaḥ manasi karoti

original: ‘ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānaṁ? Na nu kho ahosiṁ atītamaddhānaṁ? Kiṁ nu kho ahosiṁ
analyzed: ahosim nu kho aham atīta maddhāna na nu kho ahosim atīta maddhāna kim nu kho ahosi

original: atītamaddhānaṁ? Kathaṁ nu kho ahosiṁ atītamaddhānaṁ? Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho
analyzed: atīta maddhāna katham nu kho ahosim atīta maddhāna kim hutvā kim ahosim nu kho

original: ahaṁ atītamaddhānaṁ?
analyzed: aham

original: Bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ? Na nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṁ? Kiṁ
analyzed: bhavissāmi nu kho aham anāgata maddhāna na nu kho bhavissāmi anāgata maddhāna ki

original: nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṁ? Kathaṁ nu kho bhavissāmi anāgatamaddhānaṁ? Kiṁ
analyzed: nu kho bhavissāmi anāgata maddhāna katham nu kho bhavissāmi anāgata maddhāna ki

original: hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānan’ti?
analyzed: hutvā kim bhavissāmi nu khalu aham anāgatam addhānam ti

original: Etarahi vā paccuppannamaddhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ kathaṅkathī hoti:
analyzed: etarahi vā paccuppannam addhānam ajjhattam kathaṅkathī hoti

original: ‘ahaṁ nu khosmi? No nu khosmi? Kiṁ nu khosmi? Kathaṁ nu khosmi? Ayaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato? So kuhiṁ gāmī bhavissatī’ti?
analyzed: aham nu kho asmi no nu kho asmi kim nu kho asmi katham nu kho asmi ayam nu kho satto kutas āgataḥ saḥ kuhim gāmī bhavissati iti

original: Tassa evaṁ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṁ diṭṭhīnaṁ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
analyzed: tassa evam ayonisas manasikarotaḥ channam diṭṭhīnam aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: ‘Atthi me attā’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati;
analyzed: atthi me attā iti vai assa saccatas thetatas diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: ‘natthi me attā’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati;
analyzed: natthi me attā ati vai assa saccatas thetatas diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: ‘attanāva attānaṁ sañjānāmī’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati;
analyzed: attanā ava attānam sañjānāmi iti vai assa saccataḥ thetataḥ diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: ‘attanāva anattānaṁ sañjānāmī’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati;
analyzed: attanā va anattānam sañjānāmi iti vai assa saccataḥ thetataḥ diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: ‘anattanāva attānaṁ sañjānāmī’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati;
analyzed: an attanā ava attānam sañjānāmi iti vai assa saccataḥ thetataḥ diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: atha vā panassa evaṁ diṭṭhi hoti:
analyzed: atha vā panassa evam diṭṭhi hoti

original: ‘yo me ayaṁ attā vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṁ kammānaṁ vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti
analyzed: yaḥ me ayam attā vadaḥ vedeyyaḥ tatra tatra kalyāṇa pāpakānam kammānam vipākam paṭisaveda iti

original: so kho pana me ayaṁ attā nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī’ti.
analyzed: saḥ kho pana me ayam attā niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ a vipariṇāma dhammo sassati samam tathā iva ṭhassati iti

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigataṁ diṭṭhigahanaṁ diṭṭhikantāraṁ diṭṭhivisūkaṁ diṭṭhivipphanditaṁ diṭṭhisaṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave diṭṭhi gatam diṭṭhi gahanam diṭṭhi kantāram diṭṭhi visūkam diṭṭhi vipphanditam diṭṭhi sayojana

original: Diṭṭhisaṁyojanasaṁyutto, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi;
analyzed: diṭṭhi sayojana sayuttaḥ bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ na parimuccati jātiyāḥ jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi

original: ‘na parimuccati dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na parimuccati dukkhasma ati vadāmi

original: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako—
analyzed: sutavā ca kho bhikkhave ariya sāvako

original: ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto—
analyzed: ariyānam dassāvī ariya dhammassa kovidaḥ ariya dhamme su vinītaḥ sappurisānam dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme su vinītaḥ

original: manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānāti amanasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānāti.
analyzed: manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānāti a manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānāti

original: So manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānanto amanasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānanto ye dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme na manasi karoti, ye dhammā manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme manasi karoti.
analyzed: saḥ manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānantaḥ a manasikaraṇīye dhamme pajānantaḥ ye dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme na manasi karoti ye dhammā manasikaraṇīyā te dhamme manasi karoti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme na manasi karoti?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ na manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme na manasi karoti

original: Yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhati;
analyzed: yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikarotaḥ anuppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: anuppanno vā bhavāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā bhavāsavo pavaḍḍhati;
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: anuppanno vā avijjāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā avijjāsavo pavaḍḍhati—
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ uppajjati uppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ pavaḍḍhati

original: ime dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā, ye dhamme na manasi karoti.
analyzed: ime dhammāḥ na manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme na manasi karoti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme manasi karoti

original: Yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pahīyati;
analyzed: yassa bhikkhave dhamme manasikarotaḥ anuppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā kāma āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: anuppanno vā bhavāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā bhavāsavo pahīyati;
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā bhava āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: anuppanno vā avijjāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā avijjāsavo pahīyati—
analyzed: anuppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ vā avijjā āsavaḥ pahīyati

original: ime dhammā manasikaraṇīyā ye dhamme manasi karoti.
analyzed: ime dhammāḥ manasikaraṇīyāḥ ye dhamme manasi karoti

original: Tassa amanasikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ amanasikārā manasikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ manasikārā anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa a manasikaraṇīyānam dhammānam a manasikārāḥ manasikaraṇīyānam dhammānam manasikārāḥ anuppannā ca iva āsavā na uppajjanti uppannā ca āsavā pahīyanti

original: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yoniso manasi karoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti yoniso manasi karoti,
analyzed: saḥ idam dukkhanti yonisas manasi karoti ayam dukkha samudayo ti yonisas manasi karoti

original: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti yoniso manasi karoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodho ti yonisas manasi karoti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: yoniso manasi karoti.
analyzed: yonisaḥ manasi karoti

original: Tassa evaṁ yoniso manasikaroto tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti—
analyzed: tassa evam yonisas manasikarotaḥ tīṇi sayojanāni pahīyanti

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso.
analyzed: sa kāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavāḥ dassanā pahātabbā

original: 2. Saṁvarāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: savara apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavā savarā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cakkhundriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas cakkhu indriya savara savutaḥ viharati

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ saṁvutassa viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave cakkhu indriya savaram a savutassa viharataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhā cakkhu indriya savaram savutassa viharataḥ te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso sotindriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati …pe…
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ viharati pe

original: ghānindriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati …pe…
analyzed: viharati pe

original: jivhindriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati …pe…
analyzed: viharati pe

original: kāyindriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati …pe…
analyzed: viharati pe

original: manindriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati.
analyzed: viharati

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, manindriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, manindriyasaṁvaraṁ saṁvutassa viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave manindriya savaram a savutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ manindriya savaram savutassa viharato eva te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, saṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, saṁvaraṁ saṁvutassa viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave savaram asavutassa viharataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhā savaram savutassa viharataḥ te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavā savarā pahātabbā

original: 3. Paṭisevanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: paṭisevana apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṁ paṭisevati:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas cīvaram paṭisevati

original: ‘yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya, uṇhassa paṭighātāya, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ paṭighātāya, yāvadeva hirikopīnappaṭicchādanatthaṁ’.
analyzed: yāvat eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍasama kasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassānam paṭighātāya yāvat eva

original: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevati:
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ piṇḍapātam paṭisevati

original: ‘neva davāya, na madāya, na maṇḍanāya, na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā
analyzed: na iva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāvat eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā

original: yāpanāya, vihiṁsūparatiyā, brahmacariyānuggahāya, iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi
analyzed: yāpanāya brahmacariya anuggahāya iti purāṇam ca vedanam paṭihaṅkhāmi

original: navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro ca’.
analyzed: navam ca vedanam na uppādessāmi yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajja tā ca phāsu vihāraḥ ca

original: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso senāsanaṁ paṭisevati:
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ senāsanam paṭisevati

original: ‘yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya, uṇhassa paṭighātāya, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ paṭighātāya, yāvadeva utuparissayavinodanapaṭisallānārāmatthaṁ’.
analyzed: yāvat eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍasama kasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassānam paṭighātāya yāvat eva utu parissaya vinodana paṭisallāna ārāmattha

original: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paṭisevati:
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisas gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram paṭisevati

original: ‘yāvadeva uppannānaṁ veyyābādhikānaṁ vedanānaṁ paṭighātāya, abyābajjhaparamatāya’.
analyzed: yāvat eva uppannānam veyyābādhikānam vedanānam paṭighātāya a byābajjha parama tāya

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, appaṭisevato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, paṭisevato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave appaṭisevataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhā paṭisevataḥ eva te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā

original: 4. Adhivāsanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: adhivāsana apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavāḥ adhivāsanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa, jighacchāya
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ khamaḥ hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya

original: pipāsāya. Ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ, duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ,
analyzed: pipāsāya duruttānam durāgatānam vacana pathāna

original: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ
analyzed: uppannānam sārīrikānam vedanānam dukkhānam tibbānam kharānam kaṭukānam asātānam amanāpānam

original: pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
analyzed: adhivāsaka jātikaḥ hoti

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, anadhivāsayato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, adhivāsayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave an adhivāsayataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ adhivāsayataḥ te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavāḥ adhivāsanā pahātabbā

original: 5. Parivajjanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: parivajjana apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṁ hatthiṁ parivajjeti, caṇḍaṁ assaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ caṇḍam hatthim parivajjeti caṇḍam assa

original: parivajjeti, caṇḍaṁ goṇaṁ parivajjeti, caṇḍaṁ kukkuraṁ parivajjeti, ahiṁ khāṇuṁ kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: parivajja iti caṇḍam goṇam parivajja iti caṇḍam kukkuram parivajja iti ahim khāṇum kaṇṭakaṭṭhāna

original: sobbhaṁ papātaṁ candanikaṁ oḷigallaṁ.
analyzed: papātam candanikam oḷigalla

original: Yathārūpe anāsane nisinnaṁ yathārūpe agocare carantaṁ yathārūpe pāpake mitte bhajantaṁ
analyzed: yathārūpe anāsane nisinnam yathārūpe agocare carantam yathārūpe pāpake mitte bhajanta

original: viññū sabrahmacārī pāpakesu ṭhānesu okappeyyuṁ, so tañca anāsanaṁ tañca agocaraṁ
analyzed: viññū sabrahmacārī pāpakesu ṭhānesu okappeyyu saḥ tat ca anāsanam tat ca agocara

original: te ca pāpake mitte paṭisaṅkhā yoniso parivajjeti.
analyzed: te ca pāpake mitte paṭisaṅkhā yonisas parivajja iti

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, aparivajjayato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, parivajjayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave a parivajjayataḥ uppajjeyyum āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhā parivajjayataḥ eva te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā

original: 6. Vinodanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: vinodana apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavāḥ vinodanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas uppannam kāma vitakkam na adhivāseti pajahati

original: vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti, uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ
analyzed: vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvam gama iti uppannam byāpāda vitakkam pe uppannam vihisā vitakka

original: …pe… uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
analyzed: pe uppanna uppanne pāpake akusale dhamme na adhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvam gameti

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, avinodayato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, vinodayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave a vinodayataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ vinodayataḥ eva te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavāḥ vinodanā pahātabbā

original: 7. Bhāvanāpahātabbaāsava
analyzed: bhāvanā apahātabba āsava

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavāḥ bhāvanā pahātabbā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ;
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas sati sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: paṭisaṅkhā yoniso dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisas dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti pe

original: vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: vīriya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: pītisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: passaddhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: samādhisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: samādhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāva iti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Yañhissa, bhikkhave, abhāvayato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, bhāvayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
analyzed: yañhi ssa bhikkhave a bhāvayataḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ bhāvayataḥ eva te āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ na honti

original: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime vuccanti bhikkhave āsavāḥ bhāvanā pahātabbā

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbā te dassanā pahīnā honti,
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno ye āsavāḥ dassanā pahātabbā te dassanā pahīnā honti

original: ye āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā te saṁvarā pahīnā honti, ye āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā
analyzed: ye āsavā savarā pahātabbā te savarā pahīnāḥ honti ye āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā

original: te paṭisevanā pahīnā honti, ye āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā te adhivāsanā pahīnā honti,
analyzed: te paṭisevanā pahīnāḥ honti ye āsavāḥ adhivāsanā pahātabbā te adhivāsanā pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā te parivajjanā pahīnā honti, ye āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā
analyzed: ye āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā te parivajjanā pahīnā honti ye āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā

original: te vinodanā pahīnā honti, ye āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā te bhāvanā pahīnā honti;
analyzed: te vinodanā pahīnāḥ honti ye āsavāḥ bhāvanā pahātabbā te bhāvanā pahīnāḥ honti

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave: ‘bhikkhu sabbāsavasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati, acchecchi taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu sabba asava savara savutaḥ viharati dukkhassa ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Sabbāsavasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: sabbāsava suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
